701903f-a.title: Bronx: Tinton Avenue - Southern Boulevard
701903f-a.text:
484 Tinton Avenue, east side, adjoining Southern Boulevard,
showing a straw mattress shop in a very old frame house.
August 16, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONS

701836f-a.title: Bronx: Southern Boulevard - Tinton Avenue
701836f-a.text:
Intersection of Southern Boulevard (right) and Tinton Avenue,
looking north.
August 16, 1940
P. L. Sperr
NO REPRODUCTIONE
